trans-unit.source: The exception that is thrown when a XAML writer attempts to write a value for a duplicate member into the same object node.
trans-unit.target: 当 XAML 编写器尝试写入相同的对象节点值为一个重复的成员时引发的异常。

trans-unit.source: If you handle this exception from a XAML node stream, members might be reported as duplicates in several possible situations.
trans-unit.target: 如果你处理此异常从 XAML 节点流，成员可能会报告为几种可能的情况下的重复项。

trans-unit.source: For example, an explicit property element for a XAML content property might be preceded by whitespace that is interpreted as content, if the collection is whitespace significant.
trans-unit.target: 例如，为 XAML 内容属性的显式属性元素可能前面的空白将被解释为内容，如果该集合为空格。

trans-unit.source: Or the XAML writer might be attempting to reset a property that should instead be using a `GetObject` default value.
trans-unit.target: 或 XAML 编写器可能会尝试重置一个属性，应改为使用`GetObject`默认值。

trans-unit.source: If you analyze individual nodes in the XAML node stream, you can often determine the source of the problem.
trans-unit.target: 如果您分析 XAML 节点流中的各个节点，你通常可以确定问题的源。

trans-unit.source: If a XAML object writer provides special handing for duplicate members, it can prevent some duplicate member exceptions if you specify <xref:System.Xaml.XamlObjectWriterSettings.SkipDuplicatePropertyCheck%2A> as `true` in <xref:System.Xaml.XamlObjectWriterSettings> that initialize the <xref:System.Xaml.XamlObjectWriter>.
trans-unit.target: 如果 XAML 对象编写器提供了重复的成员的特殊处理，如果指定，它会阻止某些重复成员异常<xref:System.Xaml.XamlObjectWriterSettings.SkipDuplicatePropertyCheck%2A>作为`true`中<xref:System.Xaml.XamlObjectWriterSettings>初始化<xref:System.Xaml.XamlObjectWriter>.</xref:System.Xaml.XamlObjectWriter> </xref:System.Xaml.XamlObjectWriterSettings> </xref:System.Xaml.XamlObjectWriterSettings.SkipDuplicatePropertyCheck%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Xaml.XamlDuplicateMemberException"></xref> class with a system-supplied message that describes the error.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Xaml.XamlDuplicateMemberException"></xref>使用系统提供的描述错误的消息的类。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Xaml.XamlDuplicateMemberException"></xref> class with a specified message that describes the error.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Xaml.XamlDuplicateMemberException"></xref>使用指定的描述错误的消息的类。

trans-unit.source: The message that describes the exception.
trans-unit.target: 描述异常的消息。

trans-unit.source: The caller of this constructor is required to ensure that this string has been localized for the current system culture.
trans-unit.target: 此构造函数的调用方需要确保此字符串已针对当前系统区域性进行了本地化。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Xaml.XamlDuplicateMemberException"></xref> class with serialized data.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Xaml.XamlDuplicateMemberException"></xref>用序列化数据的类。

trans-unit.source: The object that holds the serialized object data.
trans-unit.target: 承载序列化的对象数据的对象。

trans-unit.source: The contextual information about the source or destination.
trans-unit.target: 有关源或目标的上下文信息。

trans-unit.source: info is .
trans-unit.target: infois .

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Xaml.XamlDuplicateMemberException"></xref> class with a specified error message and a reference to the inner exception that is the cause of this exception.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Xaml.XamlDuplicateMemberException"></xref>使用指定的错误消息和对导致此异常的内部异常的引用的类。

trans-unit.source: An exception that is thrown as a direct result of a previous exception should include a reference to the previous exception in the <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 前一个异常的直接结果应包含中的前一个异常的引用引发的异常，<xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>属性。</xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> property returns the same value that is passed into the constructor, or `null` if the <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> property does not supply the inner exception value to the constructor.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>属性返回相同的值传递到构造函数中，或`null`如果<xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>属性不会提供给构造函数的内部异常值。</xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> </xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>

trans-unit.source: The message that describes the exception.
trans-unit.target: 描述异常的消息。

trans-unit.source: The caller of this constructor is required to ensure that this string has been localized for the current system culture.
trans-unit.target: 此构造函数的调用方需要确保此字符串已针对当前系统区域性进行了本地化。

trans-unit.source: The exception that is the cause of the current exception.
trans-unit.target: 导致当前异常的异常。

trans-unit.source: If the `innerException` parameter is not <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>, the current exception is raised in a <xref uid="langword_csharp_catch" name="catch" href=""></xref> block that handles the inner exception.
trans-unit.target: 如果`innerException`参数不是<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>中, 引发当前异常<xref uid="langword_csharp_catch" name="catch" href=""></xref>处理内部异常的块。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Xaml.XamlDuplicateMemberException"></xref> class with the relevant member and type information to report.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Xaml.XamlDuplicateMemberException"></xref>到报表的相关成员和类型信息的类。

trans-unit.source: The XAML member identifier to report.
trans-unit.target: 报表为 XAML 成员标识符。

trans-unit.source: The XAML type identifier to report as the parent type.
trans-unit.target: 报告为父类型的 XAML 类型标识符。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the XAML member identifier for the property to report as a duplicate.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置要报告为重复的属性的 XAML 成员标识符。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Xaml.XamlMember"></xref> object (XAML member identifier) to report.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Xaml.XamlMember"> </xref>到报表的对象 （XAML 成员标识符）。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Xaml.XamlDuplicateMemberException"></xref> class with serialized data.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Xaml.XamlDuplicateMemberException"></xref>用序列化数据的类。

trans-unit.source: This constructor is called during deserialization to reconstitute the exception object that is transmitted over a stream.
trans-unit.target: 在反序列化，以便重建通过流传输的异常对象过程中调用此构造函数。

trans-unit.source: The object that holds the serialized object data.
trans-unit.target: 承载序列化的对象数据的对象。

trans-unit.source: The contextual information about the source or destination.
trans-unit.target: 有关源或目标的上下文信息。

trans-unit.source: info is .
trans-unit.target: infois .

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the XAML type identifier to report as the parent type.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置要作为父类型的报告的 XAML 类型标识符。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Xaml.XamlType"></xref> object (XAML type identifier) to report as the parent type.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Xaml.XamlType"> </xref>报告为父类型的对象 （XAML 类型标识符）。
